Reviews.Title: Small but Usable
Reviews.Author: Dan
Reviews.Content: Is a good phone. Runs on a newer Android system so has a lot of features. No surprise the screen is small but usable,was purchased for mother-in-law who had an old flip phone as first smart phone. It's size makes it easy to carry. It is hard to find accessories for as not as popular in U.S. it seems. Not for a big fan of movies or other big downloads. Got here in 3 days.

Reviews.Title: Good product
Reviews.Author: Beto E.
Reviews.Content: A good phone, does just fine with its functions and is easy to handleIt has the ideal sizePriced right to be a cell of a recognized brand such as Samsung

Reviews.Title: tiny but amazing
Reviews.Author: Diany
Reviews.Content: i love this phone has every thing i need and use from a phone my son loves this phone. great for playing games

Reviews.Title: Excellent!
Reviews.Author: Joe Gil "Joe"
Reviews.Content: This is a great product based in price/range/quality. Other products of the same price haven't as much specification as this. Buy it form wireless everything and came with a guaranty seal but it has a mark above that, like if it was repleaced. Afterall the phone looks brand new and funtion just like spected.
